name: Honey Almond Soap
description:
Rich bitter almond and sweet honey and citrus notes make this natural Essential Oil Blend a treasured classic. Natural almond blends tend to fade over time, so please expect a more mild almond scent than synthetic fragrances.

Ingredients: Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil, Organic  Sunflower Oil,  Shea Butter, Essential Oils, Turmeric Powder.

pH balanced.

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz

name: Mint Chocolate Swirl
description:
Natural Essential Oils of Spearmint and Peppermint couple with organic cocoa butter and chocolate for a blissful mint chocolate treat that will remind you of a hot peppermint mocha latte, or popular mint chocolate chip ice cream.

Note: Due to the handmade nature of the soap, swirls and colors may vary slightly.
pH balanced.

Ingredients: Organic Palm Oil, Distilled Water, Organic Sunflower Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Olive Oil, Organic Cocoa Butter, Organic Chocolate, Essential Oils of Spearmint and Peppermint, Spirulina Powder.

name: Cuticle Balm
description:
Our Cuticle Balm is the most intense cuticle therapy for severely dry/damaged cuticles and hangnails. See and feel results instantly.  May be used on dry patches of skin as a repair balm.  Good for elbows, knees, hands, and feet.

These cuticle balms are 100% free from petrochemical products, preservatives, weird coloring agents or aromas made from synthetic products.  Made with the finest natural ingredients.

Ingredients:
Cocoa butter, beeswax, sweet almond oil, avocado oil, essential oil.

description:
This is one of the most beautiful soaps we have created!  It's green, has the look of jade, and is made with Omnia essential oil for fragrance. 

Fragrant notes bring to mind these words: green tea, lovely and light floral aquatic, green mandarin and spring water, with blending and base notes of white peony, pear blossom, jasmine, pistachio, blond wood and musk.

description:
Rosemary has a long history as a popular scent, and as a natural remedy.  This pH balanced handmade soap will help re-hydrate and tone the skin, keeping it taut and healthy.  Rosemary acts as an astringent, reducing wrinkles.

Aromatherapy effects:
After you shower with this soap you may notice a boost in your concentration, focus, memory and mental awareness, and have positive effects on your performance and mood.

The rosemary oil in this soap will help stimulate blood circulation when you wash.

Ingredients: Organic Palm Oil, Distilled Water, Organic Sunflower Oil, Organic Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Olive Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Rosemary Powder.

The flowers of the lotus have anti-oxidant properties, helping to maintain the skin's elasticity and thereby offering anti-aging qualities.

A thrilling fragrance that combines key notes of orange, green apple, peppermint, and herbs, this amazing soap delivers a thick, foamy lather. Enchant the senses and indulge your body today!

name: Berry Breeze Soap
description:
This pH balanced, handmade Berry Breeze soap blends together creamy coconut, palm, and olive oils to enrich skin and enhance moisture. Infused with pure and natural blueberry seeds for gentle exfoliating action, this soap brings sweet and sophisticated to a whole new level. It's more than just a thick and foamy lather- the fragrance will amaze you!

Ingredients:  Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil,  Organic Sunflower Oil,  Shea Butter, Certified Natural Fragrance, Iron Oxide, Blueberry Seeds

Hand-cut packaged wt. approx. 5 oz.

name: Raspberry Grapefruit Soap
description:
Warm and tart, our new all-natural, handmade Raspberry Grapefruit scented soap is a delight to the senses! Made with our nourishing olive oil soap batter and scented with Certified 100% natural fragrance, this soap lathers amazingly, cleans gently and rinses completely. 

Raspberries don't produce a useful essential oil, but through the wonders of science, scent chemists (called "Perfumiers") are able to combine various naturally occurring scent compounds to produce scents that mimic those of some of our favorite fruits. The fragrance oil used to scent this soap contains nothing but natural ingredients!  What's more, this handmade soap is wonderfully bubbly, mild and moisturizing, great for all skin types, and equally good as a facial soap, hand soap, or body soap. All natural ingredients at their finest!

Ingredients:  Olive Oil, Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Organic Palm Oil,  Organic Sunflower Oil,  Shea Butter, Certified Natural Fragrance, Pink Clay

Hand-cut packaged net wt approx 5 oz

name: Pink Angel Nail Polish
description:
Pink and sparkly!  

All proceeds from the sale of this color will be donated to the Susan G. Komen foundation 3-day walk in Atlanta, to the Sofia's Angels Team! http://www.the3day.org/site/TR/2013/AtlantaEvent2014?px=7230098&pg=personal&fr_id=1860

Can be worn alone or on top of your favorite color. 

 Formaldehyde-free and vegan (pigmented with natural mica), this polish has a pale pink color and shredded glitter.  As natural as we could make it!  

Long-lasting and unique, Ocean Breeze Skincare's nail polishes combine a desire for beauty with a necessity to reduce exposure to the dangers often found in cosmetics.

Each nail polish is handmade individually per bottle using natural mica for coloring. These polishes are free from the three most dangerous harsh chemicals often found in nail polish and nail polish production: Formaldehyde, Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), and Toluene.


 Our other colors were named with the ocean and beach in mind.  Each bottle is handmade and color may vary ever so slightly.


FULL SIZE Net wt. 15ml
HALF SIZE Net wt. 8ml

description:

name: Sea Bean Necklace
description:
A fun look from nature!

Sea Beans are tropical seeds that grow in pods and fall from the vine in tropical forests. They float down rivers and drift across the oceans on currents and eventually find their way to the beaches sometimes thousands of miles away from their origin.  In days past they were thought to bring good luck and fortune by the sailors who found them because of their great ability to travel long distances unharmed. They are impervious to salt water, and often float in the ocean for years at a time.

All sea beans are a little different, and each necklace is made separately.  Hamburger beans come in a variety of brown and black tones, and are approximately an inch in diameter and about a half inch thick.   Sea pearls (also called nicker beans) are most often grey, but have been found in yellow and other colors.  They are about 3/4" in diameter.  Sea hearts are in brown tones, and can grow up to 3 inches in diameter. 

Choose from 4 options:  Polished hamburger bean, natural (raw, unpolished) hamburger bean, Sea Heart, or Sea Pearl.  

These beans are laced onto a simple black nylon poly cord adjustable up to 18 inches.  A silver toned eye has been drilled into the top of the seed with a silver toned ring attached.  

Perfect for surfers, boaters, or anybody who loves the beach!

name: Chocolate Almond Soap
description:
This soap smells good enough to eat!  Please try to remember it's not a candy bar! 

Made with pure Goat Milk, real cocoa, and natural glycerin. This creamy soap will leave your skin feeling like silk.   pH balanced, and great for all skin types.

 Ingredients: Coconut Oil, Organic Palm Oil, Saffower Oil, Glycerin
(kosher, of vegetable origin), Goatâ€™s Milk, Purifed Water,

natural pigment, essential oil, cocoa.

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz

name: Lavender Loofah Soap
description:
Our unique and much-loved loofah soap is a glycerine-based soap poured into a generous one-inch slice of natural loofah (sea sponge). Lather up as you eliminate any rough spots on knees, elbows and feet.  This is a great two-in-one option for anyone too busy to exfoliate separately.  

Loofah facts:
It is the only known plant that can be grown and used as a sponge.

 Loofahs can last for months and are excellent exfoliators. They gently remove dead cells and make skin soft, smooth and healthy looking. It is also said that the fibers stimulate blood circulation, making it useful in the fight against cellulite.

Ingredients:
Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Safflower Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Aloe Vera Gel, Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner), lavender essential oil, natural pigment, natural loofah, lavender buds.

Packaged net wt approx 5.5 oz

The Hemp seed oil will make the color of this clear soap a natural light tan.  (color may vary slightly with each batch)

Ingredients:
Olive Oil (Grade A extra virgin), Palm Oil, Coconut Oil, Safflower Oil, Glycerin (kosher, of vegetable origin), Hemp Seed Oil (unrefined), Purified Water, Sodium Hydroxide (saponifying agent), Sorbitol (moisturizer), Sorbitan oleate (emulsifier), Soy bean protein (conditioner) 

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz

name: Bath Salts
description:
All-natural handmade salt soaks infused with essential oil for an amazing aromatherapy experience.  

Directions:
Place a small amount in the tub for an all-over soak.  Can also be used on a smaller scale as a foot soak.  

Ingredients:
Dendritic salt, natural and Himalayan sea salt, sodium bicarbonate, essential fragrance oil.  

Net wt 4 oz

name: Body Lotion 4 oz
description:
All natural and lightly scented, these body lotions will make your skin feel soft without feeling oily.  

Ingredients:
Purified water, aloe leaf extract, avocado oil, rice bran oil, canola oil, emulsifier, organic humectant, glycerin, stearic acid, B vitamins, capric triglycerides, buckthorn fruit extract, oat kernal extract, citric acid, potassium, sodium, glycol (organic and synthetic), essential fragrance oil.  

Net wt 4 oz

name: Nail Polish
description:
Long-lasting and unique, Ocean Breeze Skincare's nail polishes combine a desire for beauty with a necessity to reduce exposure to the dangers often found in cosmetics.

Each nail polish is handmade individually per bottle using natural mica for coloring. These polishes are free from the three most dangerous harsh chemicals often found in nail polish and nail polish production: Formaldehyde, Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP), and Toluene.

 Our colors were named with the ocean and beach in mind.  Each bottle is handmade and color may vary ever so slightly.

Please let us know if there is a color you would like to see us carry.  



FULL SIZE Net wt. 15ml
HALF SIZE Net wt. 8ml

name: Lip Balm
description:
Lightly sweetened with natural flavorings, this lip balm will make your lips feel soft and taste delicious!

These lip balms are 100% free from petrochemical products, aspartame, preservatives, weird coloring agents or artificial flavors made from synthetic products.  Made with the finest natural ingredients.  

Ingredients:
Cocoa butter, beeswax, sweet almond oil, avocado oil, natural flavor.  

Net wt .30 oz

name: Peach Soap
description:
This sweet scent will have you reminiscing about Grandma's fresh peach pie. 

The foamy lather and soft fresh scent is great for the whole family, all year long.

Ingredients:
Coconut oil, Organic palm oil, safflower oil, aloe vera gel, purified water, kosher glycerin, sodium hydroxide, emulsifier, natural pigment, essential fragrance oil.

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz bar.

name: Cucumber Melon Soap
description:
This popular scent smells incredible!

Made with kosher glycerine and all-natural ingredients so it is safe for any skin type, any time of year.

You'll love the  lather and aromatherapy qualities.

Ingredients:
Coconut oil, Organic palm oil, safflower oil, aloe vera gel, purified water, kosher glycerin, sodium hydroxide, emulsifier, natural pigment, essential fragrance oil.

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz bar.

name: Oatmeal Milk & Honey Soap
description:
This oatmeal soap is like no other!  This mild soap is infused with real oats, pure goat's milk and local organic honey.  Exact color may vary.

The sweet scent offers a preferred mild soothing choice for all skin types.  
 
Oatmeal soap is like no other!  It is a healthy choice for the whole family any time of year.

Ingredients: Coconut oil, Organic palm oil, safflower oil, kosher glycerin, goat's milk, purified water, sodium hydroxide, honey, soy bean protein, minerals, emulsifier, rolled oats, essential fragrance oil.

Packaged net wt approx 5 oz bar.
